resources.string: TURN ON THE SWITCH TO LOG
Pandora needs OVERLAY permission to show the function panel, please allow and try again.

① SingleTap to select views.
② LongPress to start moving the selected view.
③ Click the panel to see attributes.
④ Drag the panel to see more.
⑤ Press back to exit.

① Click to reset the position.
② Drag to measure.
③ Unit is 5 dp and can modify in the Config.
⑤ Press back to exit.
